name: Weirdvision
description: A weird demo I made some years ago. You are an alien on a strange world. You can mess with the graphics by pressing 'C', you can fix them again by pressing 'V'. Move and jump with arrow keys or WASD.  Press 'Z' to speak to other aliens. Press 'X' to shoot. Written in Haxe with the HaxeFlixel library.
